languages.text: {n}К вам приближается пожилой слуга с выправкой ветерана. Отточенным движением он заменяет нетронутую чашку остывшего рекафа перед Лорд-инквизитором на новую, чуть дымящуюся.{/n}

{n}An aged servant with the bearing of a veteran approaches the two of you. In a precise movement, he replaces the untouched cup of cold recaf in front of the Lord Inquisitor with a new one, slightly steaming.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}К вам приближается пожилой слуга с выправкой ветерана. Отточенным движением он заменяет нетронутую чашку остывшего рекафа перед Лорд-инквизитором на новую, чуть дымящуюся.{/n}

{n}An aged servant with the bearing of a veteran approaches the two of you. In a precise movement, he replaces the untouched cup of cold recaf in front of the Lord Inquisitor with a new one, slightly steaming.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一位上了年纪的仆人以老兵的姿态朝你们走来。他以无比精准的动作，将大审判官面前那杯还没动过、早已凉了的雷卡咖啡换成了新的咖啡，咖啡微微冒着热气。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An aged servant with the bearing of a veteran approaches the two of you. In a precise movement, he replaces the untouched cup of cold recaf in front of the Lord Inquisitor with a new one, slightly steaming.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一位上了年纪的仆人以老兵的姿态朝你们走来。他以无比精准的动作，将审判长面前那杯还没动过、早已凉了的雷卡咖啡换成了新的咖啡，咖啡微微冒着热气。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un sirviente anciano con porte de veterano se acerca a vosotros dos. Con un movimiento preciso, sustituye la taza de café frío intacta por una que humea ligeramente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An aged servant with the bearing of a veteran approaches the two of you. In a precise movement, he replaces the untouched cup of cold recaf in front of the Lord Inquisitor with a new one, slightly steaming.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sirviente anciano con porte de veterano se acerca a vosotros dos. Con un movimiento preciso, sustituye la taza de café frío intacta por una que humea ligeramente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}熟練者の所作で高齢の従者がこちらに近づいてくる。正確な動きでロード・インクィジターの前にある手つかずの冷めた模造コーヒーを、わずかに湯気が立っている新しいものに替える。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An aged servant with the bearing of a veteran approaches the two of you. In a precise movement, he replaces the untouched cup of cold recaf in front of the Lord Inquisitor with a new one, slightly steaming.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}熟練者の所作で高齢の従者がこちらに近づいてくる。正確な動きでロード・インクィジターの前にある手つかずの冷めた模造コーヒーを、わずかに湯気が立っている新しいものに替える。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un serviteur âgé à la posture de vétéran s'approche de vous deux. D'un geste précis, il remplace la tasse remplie de recaff froid devant le seigneur inquisiteur par une nouvelle, légèrement fumante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An aged servant with the bearing of a veteran approaches the two of you. In a precise movement, he replaces the untouched cup of cold recaf in front of the Lord Inquisitor with a new one, slightly steaming.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un serviteur âgé à la posture de vétéran s'approche de vous deux. D'un geste précis, il remplace la tasse remplie de recaff froid devant le seigneur inquisiteur par une nouvelle, légèrement fumante.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein älterer Diener, augenscheinlich ein Veteran, nähert sich euch beiden. Mit einer präzisen Bewegung ersetzt er die unberührte Tasse mit kaltem Rekaf vor dem Großinquisitor durch eine neue, die noch dampft.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An aged servant with the bearing of a veteran approaches the two of you. In a precise movement, he replaces the untouched cup of cold recaf in front of the Lord Inquisitor with a new one, slightly steaming.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gazilik işareti taşıyan yaşlıca bir hizmetkâr, ikinize doğru yaklaşıyor. Titiz bir hareketle Lord Engizisyoncu'nun elini değmediği soğuk kahfeyi önünden alıp sıcağını koyuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An aged servant with the bearing of a veteran approaches the two of you. In a precise movement, he replaces the untouched cup of cold recaf in front of the Lord Inquisitor with a new one, slightly steaming.{/n}
